entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -3.6°C

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
